name: Flight Simulator 2019
description:
Flight Simulator 2019 - Free Flying is a realistic flight simulation game with a number of amazing airplanes to choose from.
You can fly single piston planes, water planes, cargo planes and even military planes!
Flight Simulator 2019 - Free Flying will make you feel like a real life pilot!
Just drag the throttle bar all the way up to accelerate and then tilt the phone up to take off! Drive around, complete your missions and then guide your plane towards the runway, slow down and reduce your altitude and smoothly land on the runway. Be careful not to crash!

Play thrilling missions or just fly your favourite plane over the big beautiful open world in Flight Simulator 2019 - Free Flying.
Flying Missions
Complete challenging flying missions like water transportation, refueling, smooth landing, competing in races and many more.
Free Flight
Explore Choose your favourite airplane and fly it all over the beautiful big open world. Fly over the shimmering water and the magestic mountains.

Features of Flight Simulator 2019 - Free Flying:
- Challenging missions
- Realistic open world environment
- Fleet of awesome airplanes to choose from
- Realistic Cockpit interiors
- Beautiful airports for take off and landing your flights
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic game sound effects with take off, flight landing and airplane parking

Experience the ultimate flight ride with this realistic flight simulator.
Get Flight Simulator 2019 - Free Flying now and fly like a real pilot!
